thread.title: Rich A.

author: Rich A.
title: Rich A.
text: There are just so many contractors out there vying for your business. Home advisor is a great way to find the ones that get real positive reviews from real people. During my search for someone to work on my A/C before going to Homeadvisor, I came across many websites and "money saving" options only to find out that the businesses were unreliable, unprofessional, and offered poor service. With Homeadvisor you can be confident that the people you are dealing with are professionals with a reputation to protect that is reflected in the work they do for you.
